column4: Can some other people here please check out pdub's fstab? I'm not familiar with this type of configuration: it's at http://paste.ubuntu.com/15080/
never seen anything like it.. wubi?
Myrtti: Any idea of the proper syntax to mount stuff with fstab in Wubi? :)
absolutely no idea what so ever..  but there has to be some info about it somewhere.. canonical invented this little weirdo.. it had better send a manual with it =)
